name: Shooty Alien Game (WIP)
description:
Shoot all the aliens and robots to move on to the next level.

  • WASD / arrow keys to move.
  • mouse to aim and shoot
  • space to dash

This was made for low rez jam, but I will continue working on it for js13k.

I would love to hear feedback on the basic controls and feel of the game. Aswell as ideas on where to take it. My idea at the moment is to take it into a metroidvania direction.

Right now this game is very far away from my vision for what I want it to be, which is why I was super hesitant to upload a version for low rez jam, but here we are.
